tool_description: This API will show you the latest news about Climate Change around the world.
name: Climate Change SimpleLive
title: Climate Change SimpleLive

api_list.name: Get a individual new
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-simplelive.p.rapidapi.com/noticias/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-simplelive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://climate-change-simplelive.p.rapidapi.com/noticias/{noticiasid}"

print(response.json())
